scripts.rename: PACKAGE_NAME=$(cat package.json | grep androidPackage | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && APP_NAME=$(cat package.json | grep appName | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && node automation/libs/react-native-rename/lib/index.js "$APP_NAME" -b $PACKAGE_NAME
scripts.android-release: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ..
scripts.ios-clean: cd ios && rm -rf Podfile.lock & rm -rf Pods && pod install && cd ..
scripts.install-android-release: PACKAGE_NAME=$(cat package.json | grep androidPackage | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && adb uninstall $PACKAGE_NAME && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-x86-release.apk && adb shell am start -n "$PACKAGE_NAME/$PACKAGE_NAME.MainActivity"
